top_comments.comment: Damn, I played through the e tire game and didn't even realize it had a quality or performance mode. Lol
I'm playing the game on my PS5 and the graphic is very good.

Guardians of the Galaxy PS5 in Quality Mode uses a dynamic resolution with the highest resolution found being 3840x2160 and the lowest resolution found being 2880x1620.
Xbox Series X in Quality Mode uses a dynamic resolution with the highest resolution found being 3840x2160 and the lowest resolution found being 3200x1800.

comments_since_last_sample.body: You get what you pay for. A $500 console comes with many sacrifices. A $1500-2000 PC will easily handle anything you throw at it, and do a million other things. Peasants need to get jobs and join the master race.
Dang, rift apart’s rt performance mode is locked 60 fps at 1440p with ray tracing.
But I thought new consoles would be able to do 8k...
The worst optimized game ever (intentionally) to get 30 fps down from the release  version that was running at 60 fps in series s and same fps in 4k for series x
We’re only in the early years of these consoles and it seems as if their already hitting their limits…maybe a rock solid 4k60fps is still to big a challenge for this gen.
